title: Calvin Harris Suing For Defamation Over “Happy Ending” Cheating Stories
text:
Published By: Gossip Cop - Today 
Calvin Harris is threatening to sue all the outlets that falsely claimed he cheated on Taylor Swift by getting a "happy ending" at a Thai ...
